verses.verse: <S%H7971>Cast<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> on the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> for you shall <S%H4672>find<s%> it after <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> to <S%H7651>seven,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> to <S%H8083>eight;<s%> for you <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall be on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1653>rain,<s%> they <S%H7324>empty<s%> themselves on the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south,<s%> or toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>falls,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> it shall be.
He that <S%H8104>observes<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall not <S%H2232>sow;<s%> and he that <S%H7200>regards<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> shall not <S%H7114>reap.<s%>

As you <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> nor how the <S%H6106>bones<s%> do grow in the <S%H990>womb<s%> of her that is with <S%H4392>child:<s%> <S%H3602>even<s%> <S%H3602>so<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H3605>all.<s%>

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H3240>withhold<s%> not your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> for you <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H335>whether<s%> shall <S%H3787>prosper,<s%> either <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that, or <S%H518>whether<s%> they <S%H8147>both<s%> shall be <S%H259>alike<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
Truly the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> and a <S%H2896>pleasant<s%> thing it is for the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H8121>sun:<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in them <S%H3605>all;<s%> yet let him <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> for they shall be <S%H7235>many.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> that <S%H935>comes<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

<S%H8055>Rejoice,<s%> O <S%H970>young<s%> man, in your <S%H3208>youth;<s%> and let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3190>cheer<s%> you in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H979>youth,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and in the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> but <S%H3045>know<s%> you, that for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3708>sorrow<s%> from your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H5674>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from your <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> for <S%H3208>childhood<s%> and <S%H7839>youth<s%> are <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
